about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Welcome to our bakery! We are passionate about creating delicious baked goods using traditional methods and high-quality ingredients.
about.paragraph2: Our team of experienced bakers works every day to bring you fresh bread, pastries, and custom catering services for your special events.
about.paragraph3: We believe in the art of baking and the joy it brings to our community. Every product is made with care and attention to detail.
about.value1: Quality: We use only the finest ingredients
about.value4: Community: Serving our neighbors with pride

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.subtitle: Perfect for your special occasions
catering.intro1: We offer comprehensive catering services for all types of events. Our experienced team will work with you to create the perfect menu for your occasion.
catering.intro2: From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we provide fresh, delicious food that will impress your guests.
catering.intro3: All our catering options are customizable to meet your specific needs and dietary requirements.
catering.menuIntro: Our catering menu features a wide selection of freshly prepared items.
catering.category1Items: Sandwiches, Wraps, Salads, Hot dishes, Appetizers, Main courses, Side dishes
catering.category2Items: Cakes, Pastries, Cookies, Desserts, Sweet breads, Specialty items, Custom creations
catering.category3Items: Coffee, Tea, Juices, Soft drinks, Custom beverage packages
catering.menuOutro: All items are prepared fresh on the day of your event.
catering.step1Text: Reach out to discuss your event details, number of guests, and preferences.
catering.step2Text: We'll work together to create a customized menu that fits your needs and budget.
catering.step3Text: Once you approve the menu and details, we'll confirm your booking and timeline.
catering.step4Text: We'll prepare and deliver everything fresh, ensuring your event is a success.

service1.title: Corporate Events
service1.description: Perfect for business meetings, conferences, and office celebrations.
service1.examples: Breakfast platters, Lunch boxes, Coffee breaks, Meeting packages

service2.title: Private Parties
service2.description: Make your celebration special with our custom catering options.
service2.examples: Birthday cakes, Party platters, Appetizer selections, Dessert tables, Themed menus, Custom orders

service3.title: Special Occasions
service3.description: Elegant catering for weddings, anniversaries, and milestone events.
service3.examples: Wedding cakes, Buffet service, Elegant appetizers, Multi-course meals, Champagne service, Custom desserts, Fine dining options

catering.contactText: Interested in our catering services? Get in touch to discuss your event and receive a custom quote.

confirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
confirmation.message: Your order has been successfully placed. We will contact you shortly to confirm delivery details. You will receive an email confirmation at the address you provided.

productFullDescriptions.1: Our signature sourdough bread is made with a 48-hour fermentation process, resulting in a perfectly tangy flavor and a crispy golden crust. Made with organic flour and our house-made starter.
productFullDescriptions.2: Nutritious whole wheat bread made with 100% whole grain flour. Perfect for sandwiches or toast. High in fiber and packed with nutrients.
productFullDescriptions.3: Authentic French baguette with a crispy exterior and soft, airy interior. Baked fresh daily using traditional French techniques.
productFullDescriptions.4: Traditional rye bread with caraway seeds. Dense texture and rich flavor, perfect for sandwiches or with butter.
productFullDescriptions.5: Classic French croissant with layers of buttery pastry. Light, flaky, and perfect for breakfast.
productFullDescriptions.6: Sweet pastry filled with fruit or cream. A delicious treat any time of day.
productFullDescriptions.7: Soft roll swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with cream cheese frosting.
productFullDescriptions.8: Moist and fluffy muffin available in various flavors. Perfect with coffee or tea.
productFullDescriptions.9: Traditional British scone, perfect for afternoon tea with jam and cream.
productFullDescriptions.10: French pastry filled with rich chocolate cream and topped with chocolate glaze.
productFullDescriptions.11: Complete breakfast platter including pastries, breads, and sweet items. Perfect for morning meetings or events.
productFullDescriptions.12: Assorted selection of savory and sweet items perfect for parties and gatherings.
productFullDescriptions.13: Beautiful assortment of our finest desserts and sweet treats. Great for celebrations.
productFullDescriptions.14: Full catering package with customizable options for your event. Contact us for details.
